snippet.title: Portal 2 Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Portal 2 is targeted for launch in 2011 on the PlayStation 3, PC, Mac and Xbox 360 platforms.

For more information on Portal 2, please visit http://www.thinkwithportals.com.
